item.title: Growing fly tip at junction of Floyd Road and Church Lane, 25th February
item.description:
The commercial waste Biffa bins are overflowing and there are dozens of black sacks dumped alongside. This is a longstanding problem so why is Greenwich Council doing nothing?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charlton Church Lane, Charlton
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Severe pothole in carriageway, 25th February
item.description:
There is a severe pothole in the road. This is getting really bad and as a motorcyclist is a danger to staying stable on the bike. I was lucky this morning but could easily have come off my bike.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Underpass, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disgusting state of rippolson road, 25th February
item.description:
Too many things to photograph or too disgusting. 1. Possible human excrement that's been there about 10 day s. 2 seed husks spread all ovrr the pavement.3 cans left all over including on top of what looks like an abandonded car which has had is rear window smashed in. Plus a little pile of fly tipped rubbish.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Rippolson Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
